**2023-02-08 / @aclements, @adonovan, @andybons, @bradfitz, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @julieqiu, @rsc**

[We didn't get to everything today due to long discussions about a few of the proposals we did get to. Also, people following proposals may be interested in this discussion (not proposal): **telemetry in the Go toolchain** #58409.]

**Accepted**

- **archive/tar: add (\*Writer).AddFS** [#58000](https://go.dev/issue/58000)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **archive/zip: add (\*Writer).AddFS** [#54898](https://go.dev/issue/54898)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **cmd/compile: add GOEXPERIMENT=loopvar** [#57969](https://go.dev/issue/57969)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **context: add WithoutCancel** [#40221](https://go.dev/issue/40221)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **encoding/json: add (\*Decoder).SetLimit** [#56733](https://go.dev/issue/56733)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **reflect: deprecate SliceHeader and StringHeader** [#56906](https://go.dev/issue/56906)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **slices: new standard library package based on x/exp/slices** [#57433](https://go.dev/issue/57433)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰
- **spec: define initialization order more precisely** [#57411](https://go.dev/issue/57411)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ğŸ‰

**Declined**

- none

**Likely Accept**

- none

**Likely Decline**

- **go/printer: don't reformat single line if statements** [#57645](https://go.dev/issue/57645)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments â³

**Active**

- **archive/tar, archive/zip: add NewReaderOptions with directory traversal defenses** [#57850](https://go.dev/issue/57850)
  - commented
- **bytes: add Buffer.AvailableBuffer** [#53685](https://go.dev/issue/53685)
  - commented
- **cmd/cgo: add "//go:cgo\_unsafe\_stack\_pointer" to avoid escaping** [#56378](https://go.dev/issue/56378)
  - commented
- **cmd/compile: A GOOS=wasi GOARCH=wasm compilation target** [#58141](https://go.dev/issue/58141)
  - commented
- **cmd/go: Add a build tag for tests** [#52600](https://go.dev/issue/52600)
  - commented
- **context: add Merge** [#36503](https://go.dev/issue/36503)
  - discussion ongoing
- **crypto/tls: support QUIC as a transport** [#44886](https://go.dev/issue/44886)
  - added to minutes
- **debug/elf: add functionality for retrieving contents of DynTags that are not string values** [#56892](https://go.dev/issue/56892)
  - added to minutes
- **end support for macOS 10.13 and 10.14 in Go 1.21** [#57125](https://go.dev/issue/57125)
  - added to minutes
- **log/slog: structured, leveled logging** [#56345](https://go.dev/issue/56345)
  - discussion ongoing
- **net/http: ResponseController.EnableFullDuplex to support concurrent Request.Body reads and ResponseWriter.Writes** [#57786](https://go.dev/issue/57786)
  - commented
- **x/crypto/x509roots: new module** [#57792](https://go.dev/issue/57792)
  - added to minutes
- **x/sync/singleflight: add generic version** [#53427](https://go.dev/issue/53427)
  - added to minutes
